name: Creative AI Tool
tagline: Story generator, idea brainstormer, or creative writing assistant
overview: Build an AI-powered creative tool that helps users generate ideas, write stories, brainstorm concepts, or create content. This template is flexible - you can focus on story writing, idea generation, creative brainstorming, character creation, or any creative application. The core value: overcome creative blocks and generate ideas 10x faster.

commonProblems: Writers face creative block when starting stories
Content creators need fresh concepts constantly
Game designers need character/world building help
Marketers need creative campaign ideas at scale
validationQuestions: How often do you need creative ideas (stories, campaigns, content)?
What's your current process for brainstorming?
How long does creative block typically last?
Would you pay for unlimited creative idea generation?

possibleFocusAreas.description: Generate short stories from prompts, genres, themes
possibleFocusAreas.example: Generate a sci-fi story about AI taking over in 500 words

possibleFocusAreas.description: Generate business ideas, product features, content ideas
possibleFocusAreas.example: Give me 10 SaaS ideas for the healthcare industry

possibleFocusAreas.description: Generate detailed character profiles for stories/games
possibleFocusAreas.example: Create a morally complex villain for fantasy novel
Create a dystopian city with unique social structure

possibleFocusAreas.description: Generate blog topics, video ideas, social posts
possibleFocusAreas.example: Give me 20 YouTube video ideas for tech channel

suggestedTechniques.use: Guide AI to generate unique, creative content
suggestedTechniques.example: System: You are a creative writing expert. Generate unexpected, original stories.

suggestedTechniques.use: Higher temperature (0.8-1.0) for more creative outputs
suggestedTechniques.example: Use temperature=0.9 for brainstorming, 0.7 for structured stories
Generate idea → user provides feedback → regenerate improved version

suggestedTechniques.use: Add creative constraints to guide output
suggestedTechniques.example: Story must include: dragon, betrayal, happy ending

coreFeatures.description: User provides prompt/constraints, AI generates creative content
coreFeatures.implementation: Prompt input → constraints → Claude → display result

coreFeatures.description: Pre-built templates: story outline, character sheet, idea list
coreFeatures.implementation: JSON config with prompt templates for common use cases
Form inputs → build prompt with constraints

coreFeatures.description: Generate multiple versions of same concept
coreFeatures.implementation: Run generation 3x with same prompt, display all

userStories: As a writer, I want to generate story ideas from themes so I can overcome writer's block
As a D&D player, I want to create unique characters quickly so I can start playing faster
As a content creator, I want 50 video ideas so I can plan content for next quarter
As an entrepreneur, I want to brainstorm business ideas so I can find my next venture

v2Features: Advanced constraints (must include X, avoid Y)

backend: Prompt builder (combine template + user input + constraints)
database: Schema: id, user_id, type (story/idea/character), prompt, result, timestamp

storyGeneration.system: You are a creative writing expert. Generate original, engaging stories.

ideaBrainstorming.system: You are a creative brainstorming expert. Generate innovative, diverse ideas.

characterCreation.system: You are a character development expert. Create deep, complex characters.

successMetrics.target: 10+ ideas or 1+ complete story per session

api.optimization: Cache similar prompts, use lower token limits

differentiationIdeas: Focus on niche (e.g., only D&D character creation)
Gamification (level up based on creativity score)
Community: share and rate other users' creations

technicalChallenges.solution: Use high temperature, add 'be unexpected' to prompts, generate variations
Test different temperatures (0.7-0.9), add structure to prompts
Generate in sections, or use iterative expansion
